channel.title: 317 Command help

item.title: 317 Command help
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

[quote=“imhewbrew, post:7, topic:348919”]if (playerCommand.equals(“staffzone”) && c.playerName == “imhewbrew”) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2482, 3046, 4);
}

^this just nulled my server^

i did change imhewbrew to a player on my servers name i compiled no errors then ran server and wouldnt not log on

base: czar and delta[/quote]
That won’t work, use myne.

Change “sendMessage” to “sM”.

Read full topic

c.getPA().movePlayer(2482, 3046, 4);
}

^this just nulled my server^

i did change imhewbrew to a player on my servers name i compiled no errors then ran server and wouldnt not log on

base: czar and delta

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Command help
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

Try this

For all Moderators

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = 2482; teleportToY = 3046; sendMessahe("Welcome to staffzone");

For Just Imhewbrew

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("imhewbew") { teleportToX = 2482; teleportToY = 3046; sendMessage("Welcome to staff zone");

Hope this helped.

Rep++ if it did.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Command help
item.dc:creator: @imhewbrew imhewbrew
item.description:
@imhewbrew wrote:

can anyone make this so instead of a player right, it has there name so a user that is not any part of staff can get to the staff zone. so i can put there name in the command instead of making them a part of staff

like: (“name”))

		if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && c.playerRights >= 1) {
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2482, 3046, 4);
		}
